simple.title: Time Series Pie Chart
simple.text:
This is a new visualization of pie chart which shows data changes over time.

Dataset: The graph shows the number of each type of house sold from 2007 to 2012

simple.title: Current Year Label
simple.text: This is the year of the current visualization.

simple.title: Current Selected Year
simple.text: All the data from current year are fully highlighted

simple.title: One Category Over Time
simple.text:
This is the section of the pie chart for 3 bedroom house sold.

the area of each arc is porportional to the revenue of sales from that year.

simple.title: Hover on Arc
simple.text:
To know more information of a specific category of a year, hover over any arc to see more information

For example, hovering over the highlighted part highlights the tooltip suggests that in the year 2012, 3% of the total house sold was 1 bedroom houses, there was only 1 bedroom house sold in 2012, and it was sold for 52.7k

simple.title: Click on Arc
simple.text:
You can changing the slected year by clicking on a new arc.

For example, Click on the arc to change from 2007 to 2012

simple.title: Double Click on Arc to Compare
simple.text: You can compare all arcs in a given year by double click on anhy arc of that year to align the bases.

simple.title: Click Again on Current Year's Arc to reset
simple.text: To reset the visualization, simply click on the any arc of the given year

simple.title: Legends
simple.text: Here are the list of category for the house data

simple.title: Click on Legend
simple.text:
You can click on any category to go to the earliest timestamp where the house type appears in the data

Click on 2 bedroom label to go to 2008's visualization (as 2 bedroom houses were first sold in 2008)
